long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The plugin provides integration with our TLC Password Manager application.   You must download and install the TLC desktop software to use this plugin.  The plugin communicates from the Chrome browser to the TLC Password Manager application over HTTPS.   It detects login and registration fields to allow auto capture and auto replay of user and passwords.  The URL of the page is used to identify the entry stored in the password database.
